title: Education
description: My academic background and completed courses
paragraph1: In this section, I will share my academic background and the courses I have completed. I have completed a Higher Vocational Training Program in Web Application Development and have participated in several courses related to web development and programming. I am committed to continuous learning and always look for opportunities to improve my skills.

education1.description: Higher Vocational Training in Web Application Development - I.E.S. La Arboleda
education1.content: I have gained knowledge in programming, databases, web development, and application design. I have worked on practical projects that allowed me to apply what I learned in a real-world environment.

education2.description: Intermediate Vocational Training in Microcomputer Systems and Networks - I.E.S. La Arboleda
education2.content: I learned about installing and configuring operating systems, computer networks, and equipment maintenance. This program provided me with a solid foundation in the field of IT.
